course_title: India: The Home and the World
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 4 / Seats Avail: 1Waitlist Total: 0
course_description:
Jr/Sr Colloquium. 
We study the history of India from the home, instead of the government or political leadership. What does the history of family and home tell us about changing roles and expectations, race and class hierarchies, social and economic advance, education, democracy and politics?
sections: Class Nbr: 4168, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-3:45p, Instructor: G. Pandey, Status: Open
